name: Falling Robot Space Cats(EpicMegaJam)
description:
Mankind is no more. They were wiped out in the last galactic feline war. The hounds of the world took up the banner and banished the space kitty galactic technocracy from Earth. Now they have returned with a vengeance burning of a thousand catnip.

Play as Sir Duke as he tries to protect the outer skirts of the capital.

Game Controls

W, A ,S,D - Movement

Space, W - Jump

Left Mouse - Attack

Right Mouse - Defend

Quit Game - Alt + F4

Game By The Imperious

Music By Peritune

This is made for the Epic Game Jam
